original_text: And Baalhanan the son of Achbor died, and Hadar reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pau; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
korean_text: 악볼의 아들 바알하난이 죽고 하달이 그를 대신하여 왕이 되었으니 그 도성 이름은 바우며 그의 아내의 이름은 므헤다벨이니 마드렛의 딸이요 메사합의 손녀더라

sentences.original_text: And Baalhanan the son of Achbor died
and Hadar reigned in his stead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하달이 그의 자리를 이어 다스렸으며

sentences.original_text: and the name of his city was Pau
and his wife's name was Mehetabel
